replies.bodyText: The new /druid/coordinator/v1/compaction/compact will not be a public API and will not be documented. It is exclusively only use for integration test. The /druid/coordinator/v1/compaction/progress is an old endpoint. Seems like it does not originally have any documentation. I can add it.
replies.author: maytasm

timeline.bodyText: This endpoint has been renamed. What happens to old clients that are calling the removed endpoint?
timeline.author: ccaominh

replies.bodyText: I talked to @jihoonson (who added this API). He mentioned that this API is to be used by the web console but web console is not using it yet.
replies.author: maytasm

replies.bodyText: Oh the old API is not documented. I think it's safe to assume that no one is using it.
replies.author: jihoonson

timeline.author: ccaominh

Added integration tests for /compact
